notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!
ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.

taskDescription: The shift to online shopping has challenged many retailers who had only a brick-and-mortar location. One of the industries hit hardest by changes in consumer behavior is travel agencies because travelers can access much of the necessary pricing information themselves and then purchase tickets directly from the airlines. Name two additional store retailers that have virtually disappeared because of non-store retailing.
